text: Ilario Di Buò is an Italian archer. He was born on 13 December 1965. Di Buò competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics, 1988 Summer Olympics, 1992 Summer Olympics, 2000 Summer Olympics, 2004 Summer Olympics, and the 2008 Summer Olympics.Ilario Di BuòIlario DI BUO' == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Italian archers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Trieste
title: Ilario Di Buò
